overview: Hot House cracks open the vault and releases a whole new batch of true stories sent in by our loyal viewers. Introduced by our host, Sam Crockett, "SURE THING" is a reenactment of five real-life experiences . In our first episode, "Gone Fishin", sent in by R.H. Arden from Des Moines, IW., mega-hunk Cliff Parker goes trawlin' for a man and lands (and expertly stuffs) a trophy --flaxen haired Dax Kelly.
title: Sure Thing
